alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 3:51PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern White Pine, southeastern Elko and east central Eureka Counties through 415 PM PDT... At 349 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 17 miles northeast of Ruby Lake extending east to Lages Junction, and moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Currie, Ruby Lake, Lages Junction, Harrison Pass, Lamoille Canyon, Overland Pass and Franklin Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County
